features: Pampers Aqua Pure Wipes are made with 99% pure water for our simplest formula
Gentle and Hypoallergenic: 0% alcohol, fragrance, parabens and latex* (*no natural rubber)
1-Wipe POP TOP: Keeps wipes from drying out
pH-balancing: Helps restore skin's healthy pH better than the leading super premium baby wipe
For Purely Healthy Skin: Use Pampers Aqua Pure wipes with Pampers Pure Protection diapers
body.description: Our simplest formula, Pampers Aqua Pure baby wipes are made with 99% purified water. Perfect for sensitive skin, Aqua Pure water wipes are hypoallergenic and free of alcohol, fragrance, parabens and latex* for a soft and gentle clean. Aqua Pure wipes help restore skin’s pH better than the leading super-premium baby wipe. Plus, each pack includes our handy 1-Wipe POP TOP™, which keeps wipes from drying out. From Pampers, the #1 pediatrician recommended brand. For purely healthy skin, use Pampers Aqua Pure wipes together with Pampers Pure Protection diapers. (*No rubbing alcohol and no natural rubber latex)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 99% Water Our simplest formula, Pampers Aqua Pure wipes are formulated with 99% water for a gentle clean Soft Fabric Made with premium cotton, regenerated cellulose and polyester for a soft and gentle clean against baby’s skin 1% Gentle Skin Protectors Made with gentle cleansers, pH-balancing ingredients and preservatives (to help protect your wipes from contamination) One-Wipe Pop-Top Nothing is more frustrating than reaching for a wipe and getting three or four. That’s why our one-wipe pop-top is designed to help ensure you only get what you want. Pair with Pure Protection Diapers To help keep your baby’s skin dry and healthy, we recommend pairing Aqua Pure wipes with Pampers Pure Protection diapers—free of chlorine bleaching, fragrance, parabens and latex* (*Natural Rubber)

Compare Our Wipes 0% alcohol/parabens derma-tested 1-wipe pop-top fragrance free for sensitive skin 99% water w/cotton 0% alcohol/parabens derma-tested 1-wipe pop-top fragrance free for sensitive skin 99% water w/cotton 0% alcohol/parabens derma-tested 1-wipe pop-top fragrance free for sensitive skin 99% water w/cotton 0% alcohol/parabens derma-tested 1-wipe pop-top fragrance free for sensitive skin 99% water w/cotton

Our Commitment Caring for babies is in our DNA. Our Pampers Bright Beginnings programs enable healthy development and early success for babies and families through education, hospital partnerships, and donations March of Dimes Partnership Pampers is proud to support the March of Dimes in giving every baby a fighting chance. We help provide our smallest diapers to the 1 million babies born before 28-week gestational age each year Sustainability Pampers cares for every baby and the planet they grow up in. We maintain zero manufacturing to landfill across all our plants and are committed to 100% renewable electricity by 2030 Community Donations Through ongoing donation efforts and partnerships with organizations like Feeding America and Matthew 25, Pampers strives to help babies get the bright beginnings they deserve Changing Table Access 9 out of 10 dads have used a public restroom that lacks a changing table. As part of our “Love the Change” campaign, we’re providing 5,000 changing tables for men’s restrooms across North America Hospital Support Proud to be the #1 choice of U.S. hospitals for nearly 50 years, we partner with nurses to develop skin-protecting products and support nursing education—all to help baby’s healthy development

What are Aqua Pure wipes made of? Aqua Pure wipes are made of 99% water and plant-based ingredients for a gentle clean. Remaining ingredients include 1% dermatologically tested gentle cleansers to help maintain the pH balance of baby’s skin and help the wipe stay fresh over time Are Pampers wipes safe for my baby? Yes! Babies' health and safety are our first priority at Pampers with our hypoallergenic products that are free of parabens and latex. Our wipes are safe and are thoroughly tested to make sure they are safe for your baby and baby’s skin Are these wipes flushable? No. Our wipes are not designed to be flushed. Which diaper should I use with Pampers Aqua Pure wipes? We recommend using Pampers Pure Protection diapers with Pampers Aqua Pure wipes for healthy skin. Pampers Pure Protection diapers are free of chlorine bleaching, fragrance, parabens and latex* (*Natural Rubber) Do Pampers Wipes come with a pop-top? Yes! Pampers Aqua Pure wipes are available with either a pop-top or refill pack that can be used in wipes containers. Our pop-tops come with a one-wipe dispensing lid so you only get the wipes you need

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Brand of Wipes!
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are more wet than any other brand we have tried, which makes for easy clean up regardless of the type of mess.. They are gentle on infant skin. Minimal scent makes them more tolerable for face wiping! Only complaint is how they are layered in their container--they often get stuck to each other an pull out more wipes than needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are soft, cost effective, have no harmful ingredients and they come out individually so no wipes are wastes. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No need to experiment - Buy this
reviews.reviewText: With a kid with very sensitive skin, we tried every wipe and diaper out there. This is the only wipe that isn't completely water, has actual moisture, and cleans my kid without breaking him out. Everyone is different but starting with this product may save you a ton of time and wasted money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wipes tecksure is great
reviews.reviewText: I love the quality and I am using this product since 1 year for my baby no rashes and perfect quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not just for babies!
reviews.reviewText: I use these for everyday to make sure I am fresh and clean...down there! They are soft and thick. Very little scent. They work and leave me feeling clean and confident!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are my all time favorite wipes, and I have tried MANY. they don’t irritate my babies skin and they’re thick and moist enough to get the job done. Excellent quality and made clean without added fragrances or other irritants.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Favorite wipes ever, have been using them for the last 5 years (and 3 babies) now. Won't use anything else! Love that they don't shred apart in your hand, not scented, no weird textures or grit, and perfectly wet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
